      • run

        public void run()
        This function will call both displayPoints and updateImageSeq, is a shortcut to make functional.

        public void updateImageSeq()

      • displayImage

        public void displayImage(float rotX,
                float rotY,
                float rotZ)
        *K Use this Function to display the image as a Solid
        Parameters:
        rotX - - This is the rotation in X
        rotY - - This is the Rotation in Y
        rotZ - - This is the Rotation in Z

      • displayPoints

        public void displayPoints(int thickness,
                 int alpha,
                 float rotX,
                 float rotY,
                 float rotZ)
        *K Use this Function to display the image as Points.
        Parameters:
        thickness - - This is the Thickness of the Points, the 'strokeWeight'
        alpha - - This is the transparency of the points
        rotX - - This is the rotation in X
        rotY - - This is the Rotation in Y
        rotZ - - This is the Rotation in Z
